body:
Proter is available as a library from Maven Central, so you can add it as a dependency in your project. For example, in sbt:
1libraryDependencies += "com.workflowfm" %% "proter" % "0.7.4" Proter is currently only available in Scala 2.12.12.
title: Getting Started

body:
Welcome to the Proter documentation. This guide shows you how to get started creating creating simulations using Proter and the key concepts involved.
Get started
title: Reference

body:
A discrete event simulator for asynchronous prioritized processes written in Scala.Proter is named after the first half of the Greek word προτεραιότητα (pɾo.te.ɾeˈo.ti.ta), meaning "priority".
Read the DocsAPI DocumentationSource
Authors Maintainer Petros Papapanagiotou - - - Contributors A big thank you to the following contributors in order of appearance:
